quiz.question: Which ad product helps brands target users similar to a creator's followers?
Which influencer platform was an early marketplace connecting brands to YouTube creators?
Which platform native analytics insight helps measure story-level performance?
options: Total number of uploaded profile videos

quiz.question: Which company introduced the first native social-platform shopping checkout experience?
Which metric do platforms often use to detect inauthentic influencer behavior?
options: Sudden spikes in follower acquisition patterns
quiz.answer: Sudden spikes in follower acquisition patterns

quiz.question: Which year did Instagram introduce algorithmic feed ranking replacing chronological order?
Which influencer scandal highlighted nondisclosure issues in 2017 festival promotions?
Which platform feature allows creators to earn recurring subscriber revenue natively?
Which influencer-focused scandal led to increased platform enforcement around 2018-2020?
options: Undisclosed paid partnerships and fake followers
High editorial budgets at small publishers
quiz.answer: Undisclosed paid partnerships and fake followers

quiz.question: Which global regulation most directly affects cross-border data use in influencer platforms?
Which advertising format did Snapchat pioneer for vertical mobile-first viewing?
Which metric is most useful to compare virality independent of audience size?
Which verification practice supports compliance with disclosure regulations?
options: Hiding sponsorship details in comments only
Using only emoji to indicate partnership
Including clear sponsorship labels in post copy
quiz.answer: Including clear sponsorship labels in post copy

quiz.question: Which metric combination best estimates long-term influencer audience quality?
options: Number of sponsored posts and post length
Account bio length and profile picture quality

quiz.question: Which strategy helps scale influencer programs while maintaining authenticity?
options: Replacing influencers with only paid ads
Leveraging micro-influencers with shared brand values
quiz.answer: Leveraging micro-influencers with shared brand values
